DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine immune response three dose level Quadrivalent VLP vaccine healthy young ( 18-49 ) adult . The study break four treatment group . Each group enroll 100 subject , total 400 subject . Groups A-C receive one three dose level Quadrivalent VLP vaccine , Group D receive commercially available trivalent influenza vaccine ( TIV ) . The study also evaluate safety tolerability Quadrivalent VLP vaccine formulation .
DOC.brief_title: Quadrivalent Influenza VLP Vaccine Dose Ranging Study Young Adults
